pg.tdk.title: Gate.io Market Maker | Best market maker
pg.tdk.desc: Gate.io Provide the best APIs, cash incentives and rebate bonuses to our market makers.
pg.banner.title: Market Maker Program
pg.banner.subt: Become a market maker on Gate and enjoy higher rebates or lower trading fees.
pg.bus.title: Why Join Gate’s Market Maker Program?
pg.bitem.ted: Gate ranks among the top 5 crypto exchanges by trading volume. Join us to grow your business and unlock new opportunities.
pg.bitem.hrd: Qualified market makers can enjoy highly competitive maker fee rebates, increased API rate limits, and access to COLO services.
pg.bitem.lcd: Gate offers financing services to eligible market makers. Top-ranked market makers may even qualify for zero-interest loans.
pg.bitem.red: Receive daily reports tailored for institutional liquidity providers.
pg.bitem.csd: Gate occasionally launches regional liquidity programs to better support VIP clients across different markets.
pg.bitem.rpd: Both referrers and referees can enjoy VIP/MM tier upgrades for successful invitations.
pg.bitem.btd: Show your trading volume on other exchanges to apply for Gate’s liquidity program. We’ll offer a VIP+1 or MM+1 trial tier to help you get started.
pg.bitem.gad: Access public market data including tickers, trades, depth, funding rates, and more.
pg.steps.title: How to Become a Gate Market Maker
pg.steps.desc1: Sign up on Gate to begin your digital asset trading journey.
pg.steps.title2: Apply for the Market Maker Program
pg.steps.desc2: Submit your application to unlock exclusive support and privileges.
pg.steps.desc3: Integrate through API and start actively providing market liquidity.
pg.lend.title: Lending Services
pg.lend.desc: Gate provides OTC lending and financing services to help market makers hedge, provide liquidity, or engage in other strategies under favorable conditions.
pg.contact.title: Contact us
pg.contact.desc: Eligible users can join Gate’s Market Maker Program. To check if you qualify, please reach out to your dedicated VIP account manager.
pg.contact.error4: Please enter a valid email address
pg.form.succ: Submission successful! We will contact you within 3 working days.
